mail.subject.createdFor: Account created for you by WiSSL 3rd party
mail.subject.newVault: A WiSSL vault has been granted to you!
mail.body.reset: Click here to change your password (this link is only valid ONCE):
mail.body.otherAccount: Click here to save a referant's secret part to help him recover his password later:
mail.body.needRestore: Follow the link to help give back his password to a saved referrer:
mail.body.createdFor2:
has created a WiSSL account for you with details you previously shared with him.
Using this WiSSL account will allow both of you to manage data more consistently, learn more about it at
mail.body.createdFor3: If you already have a WiSSL account, feel free to merge this one into it by logging in with your main account.
mail.body.createdFor4: Careful! The admin may have these credentials for now, so you SHOULD change them / merge this account!
mail.body.newVault1: A new grant has been made to you, and the granter would like you to follow the next link to make use of it:
mail.body.newVault3: You can obviously also see the data's value on WiSSL:
mail.body.askGrant1: Someone would like to ask for some of you data, to review the request and accept or decline:
